description: Building on the Ministry of Health's previous COVIDNOW dashboard, this page provides a summarised view of the COVID-19 vaccination program in Malaysia, allowing you to track its evolution on a daily basis.
waffle_header: {{ state }}: How vaccinated against COVID-19 are we?
tooltips_dose1: Number of individuals who have received at least one dose of any vaccine
tooltips_dose2: Number of individuals who received the second dose of a two-dose vaccine, or a single-dose vaccine (e.g. Cansino)
combine_header: What is the current state of the COVID-19 vaccination program?
area_chart_header: {{ state }}: Daily vaccinations by dose and target group
area_chart_header_monthly: {{ state }}: Monthly vaccinations by dose and target group
area_chart_header_yearly: {{ state }}: Yearly vaccinations by dose and target group
table_header: Which states are best vaccinated against COVID-19?
